comments.author: goldlyre
comments.body: What a change of market mood! 3 years ago, I won a similar coin: a Series 3 Cas silver 0.5 for 0.705 btc on an auction here.

comments.author: BTCOVERFIATS
comments.body: Quote from: goldlyre on September 29, 2023, 12:02:44 AMWhat a change of market mood! 3 years ago, I won a similar coin: a Series 3 Cas silver 0.5 for 0.705 btc on an auction here.Bidding will pick up. Also was the coin you purchased as dirty as this silver is? Did you purchase an ungraded or a graded coin? Exchange rate of Bitcoin at the time of purchase? Many variables at play....Best,BTCOVERFIAT

comments.author: blucepheus
comments.body: Quote from: BTCOVERFIATS on September 29, 2023, 12:24:50 AMQuote from: goldlyre on September 29, 2023, 12:02:44 AMWhat a change of market mood! 3 years ago, I won a similar coin: a Series 3 Cas silver 0.5 for 0.705 btc on an auction here.Bidding will pick up. Also was the coin you purchased as dirty as this silver is? Did you purchase an ungraded or a graded coin? Exchange rate of Bitcoin at the time of purchase? Many variables at play....Best,BTCOVERFIATAgreed. Premiums vary wildly based on many factors. I expect this coin will fetch far less than an ungraded one in better condition. A silver .5 that is graded high would for sell for even more.

comments.body: I won a ungraded one on Oct. 2020 and BTC was around 11500 at the time. Yeah, that should be neater than this coin. The bad-looking boy might be cast off absent mindedly by a layman deep at a corner of a drawer for a very long time.
